name: The Station: Escape Room
description:
ADD TO WISHLIST TO BE THE FIRST TO ESCAPE

ESCAPE ABANDONED SPACE STATION WITH FRIENDS


Try it solo or with your friends! Online multiplayer for up to 4 players. The best thing - you don't have to stress over time. After all... that is just you and the everlasting cosmos.

EXPLORE AND INTERACT


Clues can be hidden in the most unexpected places. You never know what the mysteries of the space station have prepared for you!

BE PREPARED TO GET YOUR HANDS DIRTY


When your life depends on it, you have to give it your best. The solution often turns out more beautiful than the puzzle.

DONT FORGET TO EXPERIMENT


Not every puzzle is intended to be solved. Some are in place to test your limits. Others are, in fact, not puzzles at all.
